<div class="fl-builder-content fl-builder-content-1703 fl-builder-content-primary" data-post-id="1703"><div class="fl-row fl-row-fixed-width fl-row-bg-none fl-node-5c9457aaa9b01" data-node="5c9457aaa9b01">
<div class="fl-row-content-wrap">
<div class="fl-row-content fl-row-fixed-width fl-node-content">
<div class="fl-col-group fl-node-5c9457aaab433" data-node="5c9457aaab433">
<div class="fl-col fl-node-5c9457aaab48b" data-node="5c9457aaab48b">
<div class="fl-col-content fl-node-content">
<div class="fl-module fl-module-rich-text fl-node-5c9457ad8f451" data-node="5c9457ad8f451">
<div class="fl-module-content fl-node-content">
<div class="fl-rich-text">
<p><strong>This privacy policy was last updated on May 26, 2018.</strong></p>
<p><span style="color: #000000; font-family: 微软雅黑; font-size: 14px; widows: 1;">Robustel have the following privacy statement for the purpose to provide you with details of how we will collect, store and use the personal data you supply to us.</span></p>
<div style="color: #000000; font-family: 微软雅黑; font-size: 14px; line-height: 21px; widows: 1;"><span style="line-height: 1.5;">Personal data is defined as information which relates to identifiable living individuals. </span><span style="line-height: 1.5;">Robustel </span><span style="line-height: 1.5;">will act in accordance with current legislation and meet current best practice regarding the processing of personal data. </span></div>
<div style="color: #000000; font-family: 微软雅黑; font-size: 14px; line-height: 21px; widows: 1;"></div>
<div style="color: #000000; font-family: 微软雅黑; font-size: 14px; line-height: 21px; widows: 1;"><b style="background-color: inherit;">Our collection of personal data:</b></div>
<div style="color: #000000; font-family: 微软雅黑; font-size: 14px; line-height: 21px; widows: 1;">By using Robustel websites, or by contacting us by phone, email or in person, we may ask you to provide certain personal data. During exhibitions / trade shows / events or other networking functions we attend, we may collect your personal information from your business card. When using the Robustel websites, you may be asked to enter your personal details.</div>
<div style="color: #000000; font-family: 微软雅黑; font-size: 14px; line-height: 21px; widows: 1;"></div>
<div style="color: #000000; font-family: 微软雅黑; font-size: 14px; line-height: 21px; widows: 1;">In all of the above mentioned, we may collate and process personal data received in accordance with this Privacy Policy. Providing this information to the sources mentioned will be accepted as consent to its use and stored in accordance with the provisions of this Privacy Policy. We may also collect information about your computer when using our websites, including your IP address, operating system and browser type where available.</div>
<div style="color: #000000; font-family: 微软雅黑; font-size: 14px; line-height: 21px; widows: 1;"></div>
<div style="color: #000000; font-family: 微软雅黑; font-size: 14px; line-height: 21px; widows: 1;"><b style="background-color: inherit;">Our use of personal data:</b></div>
<div style="color: #000000; font-family: 微软雅黑; font-size: 14px; line-height: 21px; widows: 1;">Robustel will only use your data for the purposes for which it is provided or consented for.  By providing your name, address, email address and telephone number we can contact you about the services which we provide. If you wish to opt out at any time please contact us.</div>
<div style="color: #000000; font-family: 微软雅黑; font-size: 14px; line-height: 21px; widows: 1;"></div>
<div style="color: #000000; font-family: 微软雅黑; font-size: 14px; line-height: 21px; widows: 1;">You may be contacted in the future with information about other exhibition services we offer or send you information about products and services developed by third parties in association with Robustel. We do not distribute any information you have provided or will allow third parties to use the data we collect unless we believe it is reasonably necessary to comply with laws and regulations of government. If you would prefer your information not to be used in these ways please contact us so we may remove your personal data.</div>
<div style="color: #000000; font-family: 微软雅黑; font-size: 14px; line-height: 21px; widows: 1;"></div>
<div style="color: #000000; font-family: 微软雅黑; font-size: 14px; line-height: 21px; widows: 1;"><b style="background-color: inherit;">Storage and correction or personal data:</b></div>
<div style="color: #000000; font-family: 微软雅黑; font-size: 14px; line-height: 21px; widows: 1;">Robustel will retain the personal data it holds subject to our retention policies or until you send us notice that you no longer wish us to retain this data.  We are obliged to supply to you, on request, with a copy of the personal data we hold about you.  If you wish to exercise this right, please contact us as set out in the previous paragraph. If we have any incorrect information, please notify us as soon as possible and we will then correct our records accordingly.</div>
<div style="color: #000000; font-family: 微软雅黑; font-size: 14px; line-height: 21px; widows: 1;"></div>
<div style="color: #000000; font-family: 微软雅黑; font-size: 14px; line-height: 21px; widows: 1;"><span style="line-height: 1.5;"><b style="background-color: inherit;">Cookies:</b></span></div>
<div style="color: #000000; font-family: 微软雅黑; font-size: 14px; line-height: 21px; widows: 1;">By using Robustel websites we may obtain information by using a cookie file about your general internet which is stored on the hard drive of your computer. Cookies contain information which is transferred to your computer’s hard drive. They help us to give the best possible website experience and help us improve our website therefore delivering a better and more personalised service.</div>
<div style="color: #000000; font-family: 微软雅黑; font-size: 14px; line-height: 21px; widows: 1;"></div>
<div style="color: #000000; font-family: 微软雅黑; font-size: 14px; line-height: 21px; widows: 1;">You may refuse to accept cookies by activating the setting on your browser related to the control of cookies.  However, if you select this setting you may be unable to access certain parts of our website. Unless you have adjusted your browser setting so that it will refuse cookies, our system will issue cookies when you log on to our website.</div>
<div style="color: #000000; font-family: 微软雅黑; font-size: 14px; line-height: 21px; widows: 1;"></div>
<div style="color: #000000; font-family: 微软雅黑; font-size: 14px; line-height: 21px; widows: 1;"><b style="background-color: inherit;">Privacy Policy amendments:</b></div>
<div style="color: #000000; font-family: 微软雅黑; font-size: 14px; line-height: 21px; widows: 1;">We may make changes to this Privacy Policy and will posting the new version on our website.</div>
<div style="color: #000000; font-family: 微软雅黑; font-size: 14px; line-height: 21px; widows: 1;"></div>
<div style="color: #000000; font-family: 微软雅黑; font-size: 14px; line-height: 21px; widows: 1;"><b style="background-color: inherit;">Links and other websites:</b></div>
<div style="color: #000000; font-family: 微软雅黑; font-size: 14px; line-height: 21px; widows: 1;">Other websites may be links within Robustel websites, please note that we cannot be held responsible for the privacy policy of other websites and this policy applies to our websites only. We encourage you to read the privacy policy of all the other websites you visit.  Please check those policies before you submit any personal data to those websites.</div>
<div style="color: #000000; font-family: 微软雅黑; font-size: 14px; line-height: 21px; widows: 1;"></div>

    jQuery(document).ready(function ($) {
        // 移动端菜单按钮菜单
        jQuery(".mobile-menu-btn").on('click', function (e) {
            e.stopPropagation();
            jQuery('header .nav-bar').slideToggle('fast');
        });


        // 移动端菜单点击
        jQuery("header .nav-bar > li.menu-item-has-children").on("click", function (e) {
            $(this).toggleClass('open');
            $(this).find(".sub-menu").stop().slideToggle(400);
        });


        //头部搜索框
        jQuery(".search-box .search-btn").on("click", function (e) {
            jQuery("#search-form").fadeToggle(400);
            jQuery("#search-form input[type=text]").focus();
        });

        jQuery("header .nav-bar > li.menu-item-has-children a").on("click", function (e) {
            e.stopPropagation();
        });


        // 返回顶部按钮
        jQuery(window).on('scroll', function (e) {
            e.stopPropagation();
            jQuery(window).scrollTop() > 500 ? jQuery('.to-top').css({
                'opacity': '1',
                "visibility": "visible"
            }) : $('.to-top').css({
                'opacity': '0',
                "visibility": "hidden"
            });
        });
        jQuery('.to-top').on('click', function (e) {
            jQuery('html,body').animate({'scrollTop': 0});
        });


        // top-bar
        $("header .top-bar .topbar-nav li").on("click", function (e) {
            $(this).toggleClass("open");
        });


        //悬浮表单 + 菜单
        $(".side-widget .link,.float-menu-wrapper .closeBtn").on("click", function (e) {
            e.stopPropagation();
            toggleClass(".float-menu-wrapper", "active");
        });

        $(".side-widget .online,.float-form-wrapper .closeBtn").on("click", function (e) {
            e.stopPropagation();
            toggleClass(".float-form-wrapper", "active");
        });


        function toggleClass(ele, className) {
            $(ele).toggleClass(className);
        }

        jQuery("input[name=url]").val(location.href);

        document.addEventListener('wpcf7mailsent', function (e) {
            var $formRedirect = jQuery(e.target).find("a.redirect");
            var formThanksUrl = $formRedirect.data("to") ? $formRedirect.data("to") : jQuery('a.redirect').data('to');
            if (formThanksUrl) {
                window.location = formThanksUrl;
            }
        }, false);


    });
